metadata.Title: CVE-2019-14697 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: musl libc through 1.1.23 has an x87 floating-point stack adjustment imbalance, related to the math/i386/ directory. In some cases, use of this library could introduce out-of-bounds writes that are not present in an application's source code.

criterions.comment: musl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
